Barcode Scanning Callbacks
Scanner Management

Detailed Description

All callbacks related to scanning and decoding barcodes.

Those callbacks are defined within the ICBarCodeReaderDelegate and received by the delegate of the ICBarCodeReader object

Function Documentation

- (void) barcodeData: (id)  data
ofType: (int)  type 

Callback received by the delegate of ICBarCodeReader each time the scanner successfully decodes a barcode.

The ICBarcodeData objects will contain ONLY the successfully decoded barcodes.

Parameters
dataAn object of type NSString if the scanner is configured to read barcodes, and of type UIImage if the scanner is used in snapshot
typeThe type of the barcode. This is one of the constants defined within eICBarCodeSymbologies
- (void) onScanMiscEvent: (int)  eventCode

Other events coming from the barcode.

These events have not been defined yet, they include :

  • Decoding events : unsuccessful decoding, start of read session, end of read session
  • Hardware events : start-up, setup modification by reading a configuration barcode, configuration barcode rejected

param eventCode An event code constant [NOT USED]

- (void) triggerPulled

Called on the delegate of ICBarCodeReader when the hardware line of the trigger is pressed.

- (void) triggerReleased

Called on the delegate of ICBarCodeReader when the hardware line of the trigger is released.

- (void) unsuccessfulDecode

Called on the delegate of ICBarCodeReader when a barcode is read but the decoding failed.
